Name: SnailQuest
About the game: Snail Quest is a puzzle game based on the 2048 movement mode. When the Player Input the Movement Direction. Every snail will move towards the same direction and only stop when it encounters an obstacle. But when the snails meet each other，they will merge into a higher level. Use the characteristics of snails to reach the designated camp. The game now has 40 handcrafted levels，and there will be another 40 levels of updates in the future. Hope you will like it
